Comment: I'll answer your question, just be clear.  Because this is one of the most striking things about this buffoon: that he behaves, on the world stage no less, like a spoilt child - having tantrums, throwing about childish names, and if baby doesn't get what he wants, when he wants it, he stamps off in a hissy fit.  I never expected him at do ANY of the things he said he would do because they were mostly patently absurd (like 24 end to Ukraine war, annexing Canada, etc, etc) - and I was never in any doubt that, at the very least, he would ape Putin, and not in a mocking way.  I dislike him intensely because he is a lying criminal, an incompetent businessman (look at the trail of failed and bankrupt companies in his wake) and is an astonishingly ignorant person on just about every level you may choose to measure.  I wouldn't trust him with my children's Monopoly money, never mind put him at the reins of the most powerful nation on earth.
Author: VainEldritch
